channel.title: Posts on OH! THO
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on OH! THO

item.title: PGN (Portable Game Notation) Parser
item.description:
<h2>Initial State</h2>
<pre class="chess-board">

bR|bN|bB|bQ|bK|bB|bN|bR bP|bP|bP|bP|bP|bP|bP|bP | | | | | | |
| | | | | | |
| | | | | | |
| | | | | | |
wP|wP|wP|wP|wP|wP|wP|wP wR|wN|wB|wQ|wK|wB|wN|wR 

<h2>Input</h2>
<pre>

  1. e4 e6

  2. e5 f6

  3. exf6 gxf6

  4. Ke2 h6

  5. Ke3 h5

  6. Ke4 e5

  7. Nh3 d6

  8. Ng5 Be6

  9. Nf3 Bh3

  10. Nc3 Bxg2

  11. Na4 b6

  12. Nc5 b5

  13. Nd3 b4

  14. Nxe5 b3 1/2-1/2

bR|bN| |bQ|bK|bB|bN|bR bP| |bP| | | | |
| | |bP| |bP| |
| | | |wN| | |bP | | | |wK| | |
|bP| | | |wN| |
wP|wP|wP|wP| |wP|bB|wP wR| |wB|wQ| |wB| |wR 

<h2>Technical Implementation</h2>
<p>Runtime polymorphism in class <code>Move</code>;</p>
<p>Dispatch using <code>std::variant</code>, <code>std::visit</code>, and CRTP (Curiously Recurring Template Pattern) in <code>template <typename ConcretePiece> class BasePiece</code>;</p>
